item.title: Notes from my first workplace as an employee
item.description: mark { background-color: #ffc266; color: black; } yellowmark { background-color: #ffffb3; color: black; } Hey, we’re back. The cadence of these notes will vary like a meandering river as it was not easy to connect different things and also keep the same voice â€“ “I am not an expert; I’m just writing it down as I fare forward and figure it out” throughout the blog. I also feel this blog post lacks a certain standard of emotional density that I thought this would have when I envisioned writing it.
